nodes.text: Phaedacomm was a Bith-managed high-security space station at the edge of the Phaeda system. The station handled signal traffic for Phaeda and kept the planet connected to the rest of the galaxy. It was also equipped with Med Station with a quarantine area, and was protected by a mine field. The seizure of Phaedacomm cut off all communications of the planet Dantooine. The Jedi Enclave on Dantooine was later targeted by the Mandalorians.
In 3962 BBY the station was taken over by Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders under the command of Dorjander Kace.
